targets.rawSql:
SELECT
       DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
		 , (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
		 , (SELECT COUNT(*) from LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where ar.AlarmType = 5 AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)) AS 'Count of Alerts'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND $__timeFilter(A.AlarmDate)

SELECT
       DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,AC.DateCreated) AS 'Average Time To Response'
		 , (SELECT DateDIFF(MI,A.AlarmDate,IC.DateClosed) FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" IC WHERE IC.CaseID=AC.CaseID) AS 'Average Time To Close'
		 , (SELECT COUNT(*) from LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where ar.AlarmType = 5 AND A.AlarmDate BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))) AS 'Count of Alerts'
FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm A, LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToCase AC, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case" C, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person P
		, LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AR
WHERE A.AlarmID = AC.AlarmID
AND A.AlarmRuleID = AR.AlarmRuleID
AND AC.CaseID = C.CaseID
AND A.AlarmDate BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

options.content:
# SOC KPI 
___
1. The analyst should respond to Alarm with **15 minutes**.
2. The analyst should close the Alarm after investigation within **60 minutes** for Critical Alerts.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Priority,
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
   (SELECT alm.[AlarmDate], alm.AlarmStatus,atm.MARCMsgID FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alm JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm ON alm.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID) almm
		JOIN
	(SELECT 
		MsgID,
		(CASE WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 75 AND 89 THEN 'Very High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 AND 74 THEN 'High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 AND 64 THEN 'Medium' WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Low' END) AS Priority 
	FROM LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg) emsg 
			ON emsg.MsgID = almm.MARCMsgID
	WHERE
  $__timeFilter(almm.AlarmDate)
GROUP BY
  Priority
ORDER BY
  CASE Priority
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Very High' THEN 2
    WHEN 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Low' THEN 5
  END

SELECT
  Priority,
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
   (SELECT alm.[AlarmDate], alm.AlarmStatus,atm.MARCMsgID FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alm JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm ON alm.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID) almm
		JOIN
	(SELECT 
		MsgID,
		(CASE WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 75 AND 89 THEN 'Very High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 AND 74 THEN 'High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 AND 64 THEN 'Medium' WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Low' END) AS Priority 
	FROM LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg) emsg 
			ON emsg.MsgID = almm.MARCMsgID
	WHERE
  $__timeFilter(almm.AlarmDate)
GROUP BY
  Priority
ORDER BY
  CASE Priority
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Very High' THEN 2
    WHEN 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Low' THEN 5
  END

options.content:
# Alarms Criticality
___
1. Critical >90
2. Very High (75 TO 89)
3. High (65 TO 74)
4. Medium (50 TO 64)
5. Low <50

targets.rawSql:
SELECT        COUNT(*) AS "Use Cases"
FROM            AIERule INNER JOIN
                         AlarmRule ON AIERule.AlarmRuleID = AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID INNER JOIN
                         AIERuleToEngine ON AIERule.AIERuleID = AIERuleToEngine.AIERuleID
						 WHERE AIERuleToEngine.Enabled =1 AND AlarmRule.Enabled =1

SELECT        COUNT(*) AS "Use Cases"
FROM            AIERule INNER JOIN
                         AlarmRule ON AIERule.AlarmRuleID = AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID INNER JOIN
                         AIERuleToEngine ON AIERule.AIERuleID = AIERuleToEngine.AIERuleID
						 WHERE AIERuleToEngine.Enabled =1 AND AlarmRule.Enabled =0

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

options.content:
# Alarms
___
1. Use Cases with Alarms Enabled
2. Use Cases without Alarms Enabled
3. All Use Cases Enabled
4. Sum of Alarms

targets.rawSql:
SELECT        COUNT(DateStructUpdated) As "Count", $__timeGroup(DateStructUpdated, '1d') AS time
FROM            AIERule INNER JOIN
                         AlarmRule ON AIERule.AlarmRuleID = AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID INNER JOIN
                         AIERuleToEngine ON AIERule.AIERuleID = AIERuleToEngine.AIERuleID
						 WHERE AIERuleToEngine.Enabled =1 AND AlarmRule.Enabled =1 and  $__timeFilter(DateStructUpdated)
						  GROUP BY $__timeGroup(DateStructUpdated, '1d')

select $__timeGroup(AlarmDate, '1d') AS time, COUNT(AlarmDate)
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
where $__timeFilter(AlarmDate)
group by $__timeGroup(AlarmDate, '1d')
order by $__timeGroup(AlarmDate, '1d')

SELECT Count(*) As 'Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Open Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
 $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Open Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
 [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Total of Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted])

SELECT Count(*) As 'Count of Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted]) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Opened Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateInserted])and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Total of Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo()))

SELECT Count(*) As 'Count of Closed Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus >= 4

SELECT Count(*) As 'Opened Alarms'
  FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm]
WHERE
  [DateInserted] BETWEEN (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeFrom())) and (dateadd(month, -1, $__timeTo())) and AlarmStatus < 4

SELECT DISTINCT
	count(DISTINCT C.CaseNumber) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] C
Where C.CaseStatusID IN (3,4,5)
    --AND CT.TagID <> 28
    AND $__timeFilter(C.DateCreated)

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseNumber as value,
  Tag.Tag as metric
  
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag
WHERE
        LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case".CaseID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.CaseID
	  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.TagID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag.TagID
          AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,5)
	  AND Tag.Tag LIKE '%Security Breach%'
 	  AND $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Open(Created)' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 3
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Resolved' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 5
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  COUNT(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[CaseStatusID]) as value,
  'Mitigated' as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
    AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 4
  GROUP BY LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name] AS [Incident Name]
	   ,LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person.FullName AS [Full Name]
	   ,ISNULL(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].Resolution,'') AS Resolution
     ,CASE WHEN LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 3 THEN 'Incident'
            WHEN LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID = 5 THEN 'Resolved'
            ELSE 'Mitigated'END AS [Incident Status]
     -- ,LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID
FROM LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case], LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person
WHERE LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].PersonID = LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Person.PersonID
      AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,4,5)
      AND $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)

SELECT [Case Tags] As 'Incident Tag',COUNT([CaseNumber]) as count FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases] 
where [Case Status] in ('Icident', 'Mitigated', 'Resolved') AND $__timeFilter([Date Created])
Group by [Case Tags]
-- Group by [Case Tags]

panels.description: Total number of days incident is still open for

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  (DATEDIFF(DAY,LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated,ISNULL(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateClosed,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) as value,
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].[Name] as metric
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case]
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,4)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

panels.title: Total days since incident was opened

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseNumber as value,
  Tag.Tag as metric
  
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag
WHERE
        LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case".CaseID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.CaseID
	  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.TagID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag.TagID
          AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,5)
	  AND Tag.Tag LIKE '%violation%'
 	  AND $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].Name as 'Case Name',
  Tag.Tag as 'Tag',
 CASE WHEN  [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case].CaseStatusid = 1 THEN 'Created'
  when [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case].CaseStatusid = 2 THEN 'Completed'
  when [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case].CaseStatusid = 3 THEN 'Incident'
  when [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case].CaseStatusid = 4 THEN 'Mitigated'
  else  'Resolved' end as [Status]
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag
WHERE
        LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case".CaseID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.CaseID
	  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.TagID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag.TagID
          AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,5)
	  AND (Tag.Tag = 'Account impersonation' OR Tag.Tag = 'Domain impersonation')
	   	  AND $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated),
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseNumber as value,
  Tag.Tag as metric
  
FROM
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case], LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag, LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag
WHERE
        LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo."Case".CaseID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.CaseID
	  AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseToTag.TagID = LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.Tag.TagID
          AND LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].CaseStatusID IN (3,5)
	  AND (Tag.Tag = 'Account impersonation' OR Tag.Tag = 'Domain impersonation')
 	  AND $__timeFilter(LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated)
ORDER BY
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case].DateCreated ASC
